issue.title: "Setup" button resolving to error

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Something isn't working as it should

labels.name: platform: Linux
labels.description: This issue occurs in the Linux version of Glare

labels.name: state: indev
labels.description: This issue is being worked on

issue.body: When clicking on the **"Setup"** button in the *bottombar*, nothing occurs; console reports errors with process.

issue.title: Portions of startup code broken on Linux

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Something isn't working as it should

labels.name: platform: Linux
labels.description: This issue occurs in the Linux version of Glare

labels.name: state: indev
labels.description: This issue is being worked on

issue.body: Code used for defining on-screen element variables are not executing properly during startup. Tested using **Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS**.

issue.title: Support for multiple display resolutions

labels.name: state: indev
labels.description: This issue is being worked on

issue.body: Develop support for **Glare** to run on multiple display resolutions; universal display capability.

issue.title: Develop support for custom on-screen element configurations

labels.name: state: indev
labels.description: This issue is being worked on

issue.body: Add support for end-users to customize on-screen elements by giving access to user-configuration files and list of I.D,'s for those elements.

issue.title: Fix loading issue with separate windows

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Something isn't working as it should

labels.name: state: indev
labels.description: This issue is being worked on

issue.body: Fix a loading issue related to opening separate windows within **Glare**; windows will take around ~1-2 seconds to fully render and open.
